results.name: Number of relatively prime Lyndon compositions (aperiodic necklaces of positive integers) with sum n.
formula: Moebius transform of A059966. Second Moebius transform of A008965.
example: The a(6) = 7 relatively prime Lyndon compositions are 15, 114, 132, 123, 1113, 1122, 11112.
The a(7) = 17 relatively prime Lyndon compositions:
